- 3 (from 10 place of first number) * 5 (from 100 place of second number) = 15 -> Shift it 3 places to the left (because we are multiplying with the 100 place of the second number) to get 15000

Step 1: Break first number 605 into its individual digits: 6 (hundreds place), 0 (tens place), and 5 (ones place).
Step 2: Similarly, break second number 629 into its individual digits: 6 (hundreds place), 2 (tens place), and 9 (ones place).
- 5 (from 1 place of first number) * 9 (from 1 place of second number) = 45 -> Shift it 0 places to the left (because we are multiplying with the 1 place of the second number) to get 45
- 5 (from 1 place of first number) * 2 (from 10 place of second number) = 10 -> Shift it 1 places to the left (because we are multiplying with the 10 place of the second number) to get 100
- 5 (from 1 place of first number) * 6 (from 100 place of second number) = 30 -> Shift it 2 places to the left (because we are multiplying with the 100 place of the second number) to get 3000
- 0 (from 10 place of first number) * 9 (from 1 place of second number) = 0 -> Shift it 1 places to the left (because we are multiplying with the 1 place of the second number) to get 0
- 0 (from 10 place of first number) * 2 (from 10 place of second number) = 0 -> Shift it 2 places to the left (because we are multiplying with the 10 place of the second number) to get 0
- 0 (from 10 place of first number) * 6 (from 100 place of second number) = 0 -> Shift it 3 places to the left (because we are multiplying with the 100 place of the second number) to get 0
- 6 (from 100 place of first number) * 9 (from 1 place of second number) = 54 -> Shift it 2 places to the left (because we are multiplying with the 1 place of the second number) to get 5400
- 6 (from 100 place of first number) * 2 (from 10 place of second number) = 12 -> Shift it 3 places to the left (because we are multiplying with the 10 place of the second number) to get 12000
- 6 (from 100 place of first number) * 6 (from 100 place of second number) = 36 -> Shift it 4 places to the left (because we are multiplying with the 100 place of the second number) to get 360000

Now, add all these results together:
The sum of 45 + 100 + 3000 + 0 + 0 + 0 + 5400 + 12000 + 360000 = 380545.
